text: Patricia A. Walrath (born August 11, 1941 in Brainerd, Minnesota) is an American politician who represented the 3rd Middlesex District in the Massachusetts House of Representatives from 1985 to 2009, was a member of the Stow, Massachusetts, Board of Selectmen from 1980 to 1986, and the Stow Finance Committee from 1977 to 1980. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:People from Brainerd, Minnesota Category:Massachusetts Democrats Category:Members of the Massachusetts House of Representatives Category:People from Stow, Massachusetts Category:Bemidji State University alumni Category:State University of New York at Oswego alumni Category:Women state legislators in Massachusetts Category:Massachusetts city council members Category:Women city councillors in the United States
title: Patricia Walrath
